name: Nico's Halloween Story
description:
On every October 31th, Nico goes to see their family. But why do they feel so stuck?

This is an 2D action game, where you need to dodge the bad ghosts! The death counter will raise, and, when you get to the end of the level, you can win or lose based on the numbers of death that you have.

Controllers:

---- Up and Down to move lanes

---- Space Bar to Jump

---- Esc to Pause

Game made by:

Alex Malheiros ( https://twitter.com/alxmalheiros )

Lorena Conrado ( https://twitter.com/0range0ceans )

Raquel Olhovetchi ( https://twitter.com/Raks_olho )
